industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Job Overview

As a Design Intern, you will have the unique opportunity to participate in a variety of projects, both at the domestic and international levels. This position is not only about supporting our design team but also about making a tangible impact with your work, possibly seeing your designs featured across various global media outlets.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with the design team to develop innovative concepts and design solutions that meet project objectives and brand standards
  • Create engaging graphics, illustrations, and layouts for digital and print media, such as social media posts, website banners, brochures, and advertisements
  • Assist in the production of multimedia content, including video editing and motion graphics, to support marketing campaigns and promotional efforts
  • Participate in brainstorming sessions and creative reviews, offering ideas and feedback to enhance design outcomes
  • Support the design team in various administrative tasks and project coordination as needed
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to integrate influencer campaigns with broader marketing initiatives
  • Organize and maintain design files and assets to ensure efficient workflow and accessibility for team members


Requirements

  • Currently pursuing a degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field
  • Passionate about social media, influencers, and digital marketing
  • Proficiency in design software, particularly Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), as well as 3D and AI design tools, is a plus
  • Strong design portfolio showcasing creative projects and technical skills across different mediums
  • Excellent visual skills with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
  • Proactive attitude, self-motivated, and eager to learn and grow in a dynamic work environment
  • Please provide your design portfolio


Benefits

  • Gain practical experience working on real-world design projects and campaigns
  • Expand your design skills and knowledge through hands-on experience with industry-standard software and tools
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand different aspects of the business and contribute to holistic design solutions that resonate with international audiences
  • Showcase your creativity and build a professional portfolio of work that highlights your skills and achievements, with the potential for your work to be showcased and recognized in other countries, further expanding your professional network and opportunities for career growth
